db.app

Interface MunicipalityDB

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyMunicipalities

    public interface MunicipalityDB
    An interface representing a municipality database of some kind. This interface defines the operations on Municipalities in the database as well as methods for retrieving a List<Municipality> of all Municipality objects from the database and a method for retrieving one db.app.Municipality by its name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCity(Municipality m)
      Adds a Municipality to the database and sets its ID to the newly created records ID
      void deleteCity(Municipality m)
      Deletes a Municipality according using its ID as condition for the query to the database.
      List<Municipality> getAllCities()
      Returns a java.util.List of all municipalities as db.app.Municipality objects.
      Municipality getByName(String name)
      Returns a reference to a new Municipality, which is fetched by name from the database.
      void updateCity(Municipality m)
      Updates a municipality using its ID as condition for the DB query and updates all fields according to their current status.
      int updateHTTPSbyName(String name, boolean https)
      Updates a municipality's https status in the database, using its name for condition in the query

        void updateCity(Municipality m)
        Updates a municipality using its ID as condition for the DB query and updates all fields according to their current status.

      • getByName

        Municipality getByName(String name)

        Parameters:
